Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add operational status tracking and automated task system

Implemented comprehensive order status management system with:

**New Status Field (agent_order_status):**
- Preventivo (Quotation)
- Ordine in entrata da agente (Incoming from agent)
- Ordine in produzione (In production)
- Ordine da inserire in baia di uscita (Ready for warehouse)
- Ordine pronto in baia da ritirare (Ready for pickup)
- Ordine pronto da consegnare NOI (Ready for our delivery)
- Ordine completato (Completed)
- Ordine in attesa di info (Waiting for info)
- In ordine dal fornitore (Supplier order)

**Automated Task Creation:**
- Creates task when agent submits new order (agent_incoming status)
- Scheduled action checks for stale orders daily
- Creates task if order stuck in same status for X days
- Configurable users and days threshold in settings

**Configuration Panel:**
- Settings > Gestione Ordini Agenti
- Select users to receive confirmation tasks
- Select users to receive stale order tasks
- Configure days threshold for stale orders

**Enhanced Views:**
- Status bar in order form with clickable statuses
- Color-coded badges in tree view
- Filters for each status
- Group by operational status
- Automatic status date tracking

**Auto-status Logic:**
- Quotations: set to ''quotation'' status
- Orders from agents: set to ''agent_incoming'' status
- Internal orders: default to ''quotation'' status
- Status change date automatically tracked
